definition[0]: if you shut someone in a room, you close the door and stop them from getting out
example[0]: Her parents shut her in an upstairs room.
example[1]: He pushed the dogs into the breakfast room and shut them in.
definition[1]: if you shut yourself in a room, you close the door and stay in there, and often stop other people from coming in
example[2]: Ellie darted back to her room and shut herself in.
example[3]: He shut himself in his room and wrote letters.
definition[2]: someone who is ill or disabled and cannot leave their house very easily
